php-file-creator.submenus.main.label: Create PHP File
php-file-creator.config.useStrictTypeInT: Determines whether `declare(strict_types=1);` is included in generated files.
php-file-creator.config.useFallbackNames: Determines whether to use a fallback namespace when no namespace could be resolved. When disabled, no namespace will be added.
php-file-creator.config.fallbackNamespac: Defines the namespace to use when fallback namespace is enabled and no other namespace could be found.
The namespace must be a valid PHP namespace according to PSR-4 (e.g. 'App', 'Vendor\Service'). Each segment must start with an uppercase letter.
php-file-creator.config.refactorNamespac: Determines whether, after a file is moved, the namespace in the file and its references should be refactored.
Specifies directories to exclude during namespace refactoring. (Note: Entries are expected in Glob pattern format, e.g., `/vendor/**`, `var/cache/**`, or `**/temp/**`.)
